FuzeOBS
[Be Right Back Screen]

Choose either the Image (static) source or Video (Animated) source
to display a 'Be Right Back' graphic.

Delete the this text source and unused image or video source!

FuzeOBS
[Ending Soon Screen]

Choose either the Image (static) source or Video (Animated) source
to display a 'Ending Soon' graphic.

Delete the this text source and unused image or video source!

FuzeOBS
[Main Scene]

This scene has two main webcams, left and right.
There is a webcam source and a display source that is hidden.

In the 'Webcam' folder, select your webcams and if
an extrernal tool like "Discord" is being used, use display capture
to get the other user's camera.

If desired, connect Alert Box + Chatbox by going to StreamLabs
Dashboard and getting the widget URLs.

Delete this text source and any other unused source!

FuzeOBS
[Starting Soon Screen]

Choose either the Image (static) source or Video (Animated) source
to display a 'Starting Soon' graphic.

Delete the this text source and unused image or video source!
